name: Dont-trust-them-all
description:
A tribute to the old legend I have enjoyed much. Created for the  GDS Jam 2020, the topic was Disinformation and Conspiracy theories.

Thanks to the authors of the assets I have been using:

  • isaiah658 (https://opengameart.org/content/isaiah658s-pixel-pack-2)
  • Fleurman (https://opengameart.org/content/tiny-characters-set)
  • CycloneJeo (https://www.deviantart.com/cyclonejeo/art/Pokemon-Utopia-Male-Sprite-Running-She...)
